sentences: Nimmer was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, in 1982.
He had classical music lessons, and studied jazz at the Wisconsin Conservatory of Music from the age of 15.
While a student at Northern Illinois University, Nimmer continued playing in Chicago clubs.
Nimmer moved to New York in 2004.
In the following year, he joined the Jazz at Lincoln Center Orchestra.
A 2012 reviewer commented that "The emphasis on melody during the set is noteworthy, as Nimmer never let his considerable chops dominate a piece for the sake of show.
